channel.title: SageScape 317
channel.description: Well, I can't really do much with my server anymore. I've run into these java heap spaces, if anyone can fix them, please post. I don't have any pictures, but there are some videos: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nw1wZdiKFDI It's a bit old, there are a bunch of skills, hunter, summoning, conquering, and more. In the video, it shows the old game frame I had, in this one, it has the 614, and has all the skills in it. Anyways... the link for source: http://sagescapepk.com/SageScape.rar Client: http://sagescapepk.com/client.rar (You'll have to extract the files and decompile the class files) a good decompiler: http://download.cnet.com/DJ-Java-Decompiler/3000-2213_4-10046809.html You'll need jrebel for the auto-server updater. http://zeroturnaround.com Any questions, just ask. I've been busy with life lately, and have no time to do things. My server will still be up, but w\e. For some advice: Take people's suggestions for the server. Good luck.

item.title: SageScape 317
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:12, topic:391332”]All of you are retarded. He deleted the .java files. The client runs on the .class ones. You have to decompile them using the decompiler he provided but it’s too mother fucking bad you can’t read.

Sage, @ your java heap space errors, are you getting them in the server or client?[/quote]
Server. :’(
EDIT: Please tell me what you guys think. And if you have any questions, I have forums. It might or might not be a bad source. I just put in the server what I thought would be cool, and took some suggestions.
EDIT 2: Heaps [code=java]Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space

If you get any sql errors, search for, in client.java and server.java, sql. then comment them out. And if you need my mysql tables, and highscores, I can provide them. A look at the highscores: http://sagescape.zapto.org
